Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ELECTION LAW

Title: Relates to designating state and city university campuses as early voting sites and polling sites
Summary: Designates campuses which are operated by the state university of New York with at least sixteen thousand enrolled students as early voting sites and polling sites.
LawCode: Amd ยง4-104, add ยง8-606, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to designating certain state university campuses as early voting sites and polling sites
